articles.description: Kremlin-backed TV created a simulation of a nuclear strike on three European capitals as presenters claimed there would be 'no survivors'.

Russian state broadcasters have simulated a terrifying nuclear strike on Europe, declaring there would be no survivors in a TV rant in response to UK support for Ukraine.
